name: HYPERCASCADE
description:
Play In Fullscreen For Best Experience.

This game takes place in a post apocalyptic rob verse where two solders from two different dimensions where they are faced in 'TWO' opposite 'VIEWS' one upright and another one upside down .

Both of them should dodge a saw coming towards them by jumping. They grow exponentially for every 5 seconds and should successfully dodge the saw. If they come in contact with the saw they will reduce in height and 'RESET' back to there original height. 

They can also throw bombs over each other to reduce their opponents height .First player to grow maximum and reach the finish line wins.

Instructions :-

Player Blue -  W  for jump ,

                               A D To move Left And Right ,

                                Left Ctrl For shooting.

Player Red -  Up Arrow  for jump,

                              Left & Right Arrow To move Left And Right,

                              Right ctrl For shooting.
